summary:
My passion to develop performance of employees and to improve employee engagement has given me the opportunity to lead several bigger and smaller projects. These projects are directed to encouraging individuals and teams to acquire new or advanced skills, knowledge, and view points, by providing learning and training facilities, and avenues where such new ideas can be applied.
By being a subjec matter expert in the field of AML and KYC Compliance, I am able to support and develop staff and engage with stakeholders across the business to improve on processes ensuring business critical SLA's are upheld

projects.title: Connecting Coping and Culture in sports
projects.description: Research article about the effect of athletes' cultural values on their use of coping strategies. Comparing Australian and Dutch athletes to see whether effects found in research outside the sports domain are also visible in sports.

publications.name: A comparison of coping-styles of individual and team athletes of Australia and the Netherlands

profile_positions.title: Business Developer KYC/ AML Quality

profile_positions.description:
• Implementation of DAC7 regulations to ensure bol.com will be compliant by 2023.
• Implementation of European Accessibility A t with bol.com services 
• Leading project to create and enforce policy through product registration ensuring third party assortment quality.
profile_positions.title: Compliance Project Lead

profile_positions.description:
• Operations Manager RCO Barcelona (ES) and Cork (IE).
• Lead operations manager supporting growth of new Barcelona operations site to 180 FTE within 1 year.
• Lead and own weekly/ monthly business reviews with ww SMT for WW Denied Party Screening (DPS) / Sanctions Operations.
    • Managing performance of 10+  Compliance Team Managers with up to 20 direct reports.
    • Managing day_to_day operations of 200 employees within multiple KYC/CDD teams.
• EU Operations Quality Change Management for Seller Identity Verification (SIV), KYC and DPS.
• Analysis of DPS Operations head count utilisation; identifying gaps & their drivers and plan mitigating strategies. 
• Manage career development of Compliance Team Managers with up to 20 direct reports.
• Project Management of EU projects in KYC/AML/Sanctions screening  to drive performance and improve customer experience.• Hiring manager for Compliance Team Managers in IE, ES and US.
• Project lead bad actor identification & reduction, with the aim to reduce weekly incoming volumes in disingenuous seller accounts by 2000 to 5000.
• Leading process improvement initiatives in DPS,  SIV and KYC.
• Lead global talent review for Risk and Compliance Operations.
profile_positions.title: Operations Manager Sanctions Screening

profile_positions.description:
• Managing a team of 40 analysists
• Compliance Operations Lead for Key Strategic Sellers ahead of NL marketplace launch. Leading fast track Compliance onboarding process of Key Selling Partners.
• EU Operations Quality Change Management for KYC and screening ensuring reduction of defects to less than 0.59% and reduction of KYC verification time.
• Leading UA Testing of Compliance platform for amazon.nl.
• Supporting new Barcelona Site Compliance Operations to ensure successful growth with 50+ employees.
• Hiring Manager of 75+ Mandarin and Dutch speaking KYC analysts.
• Manage performance and career development of cross EU teams of KYC analysts with up to 40 direct reports.
•	 Drive process improvements & document and update EU wide processes.
• Project Management of EU projects in KYC/AML to drive performance and improve customer experience.
• Ensuring SLA's are being met and upheld, by analyzing performance on team and department level and implementing improvement strategies.
• Delivery of KYC/AML training on EU level
• Quality Change Management: Roll out of EU wide quality support plan on investigations to identify quality risks and implement improved processes.
• Owner of Key Internal Processes for Amazon TRMS / KYC EU
profile_positions.title: Manager Compliance KYC & Sanctions screening

profile_positions.description:
• Leading a team of 17 compliance analysts
• Deliver training and refresher sessions to improve technical knowledge and skill set of current employee base.
• Review performance and develop performance improvement plans of tenured and new staff on a daily basis.
• Provide ad-hoc advise to operational management regarding processes and employee performance.
• Managing smaller and larger in-company projects.
• Recruitment and interviewing prospect employees.
• Chair person of Employee Engagement Committee.
• Developed and executed employee reward and recognition program leading to an increased employee engagement rate and less departmental attrition because of engagement reasons.
• Developing employee diversity and development program Amazon Ireland.
profile_positions.title: Senior Analyst KYC & Sanctions screening

profile_positions.description:
• Manage workflow processes (real time) concerning 80+ employees to uphold corporate service levels agreements.
•  Delivery of class room training to new hires and evaluating performance of new hires on a daily basis
• Dedicated Mentor for more than 80 new hires.
• Be aware of and identify new fraud patterns and trends - take appropriate action to identify and help minimise the risk posed by such trends.
• Liaise with merchants and other external and internal customers to analyse any risk.
• Investigate suspicious activity and behaviour that could potentially harm the Amazon EU websites, and their customers or merchants.
• Conduct timely and detailed KYC(Know Your Customer)/AML Due Diligence Reviews utilizing on-line search techniques and internal tools and databases
• Ensuring employees are committed to the organisation’s goals and values, motivated to contribute to organisational success, and are able at the same time to enhance their own sense of well-being by developing a reward and recognition scheme
profile_positions.title: Analyst KYC and Sanctions screening

profile_positions.description:
Voxpro is a Multilingual Business Process Outsourcing provider delivering customer contact solutions to companies and organizations in the domestic and international markets - ranging from SME-s to multinational corporations, including international blue-chip companies.

As a Dutch & English B2B support for Google Apps for Business my duties were
- To assist with resolving issues within the timeframes set by Google depending on the priorities chosen by the company and the customer.
- Provide training and mentor support to new hires.
- Provide customer support at the highest level to ensure maximum customer satisfaction
- Provide in-depth troubleshooting for issues with Google Apps account services
- Specialize in troubleshooting technical issues, including migration & synchronization issues
profile_positions.title: Multilingual Technical Support Specialist

• Creating Standard Operating Procedures for the new Cloud environment consisting of Office 365 and IAAS hosted LOB-applications.

* Customer Services

I have expanded my consultancy skills and my project and requirements management skill by being a test lead and a customer service coordinator.

profile_positions.title: Project Lead

profile_positions.description:
The KNVB is the largest sports federation in the Netherlands and organises, together with 3.400 football clubs, about 33.000 matches on a weekly bases. As an administrative assistant I checked and processed annual financial reports and other financial records of soccer clubs in the east of the Netherlands. I also registered and documented amenities of soccer clubs and got a glimpse of what it would be like to work for a large (sports) organisation.

Duties
- mapping accommodations of soccer clubs in the Netherlands
- check and organize financial budgets of soccer clubs in the Netherlands
- process ECO-TAX tax return for the soccer clubs
- redirect incoming calls
- re-organize archive
profile_positions.title: Administrative Assistant

profile_positions.description:
At the School of Sport Science Exercise and Health I participated in a research study about the effects of the cultural background of elite athletes on their on coping skills. I designed an online survey and interviewed elite national athletes from Australia and the Netherlands. The data was processed and then translated to be published in a scientific article. I am now in the process of publishing the findings in an international sports journal.
My duries entailed
- Design a research study
- Design an online survey, based on validated questionnaires
- Translate questionnaires to Dutch
- Contact sport bodies and interview Dutch and Australian athletes
- Analyse the data
- Research existing literature
- Write a research article
- Present results
profile_positions.title: Jr. Researcher
